messages.content:
can you summarize this in the minimum number of bullet points that contains all of the ideas? 
Can you summarize this into three bullet points
Revneue based and other sort of loans  
Investments in teams  
Community building  
Individual / professional growth framework in entrepreneurial training  
Mindset / culture development  
Building internal culture at Bloom for experimentation and exploration  
ToT programs  
NGO / Intl Dev funding and programs  
Replicator > accelerator  
Partner with intl Development organizations  
Build platforms to simplify running virtual learning by doing together cohort based programs

Summary in three bullet points:
1. Revenue-based and other loan options, along with investments in teams, are part of the funding strategy.
2. The focus is on community building and fostering individual and professional growth through entrepreneurial training and mindset/culture development.
3. Initiatives include building an internal culture of experimentation, partnering with international development organizations, and creating platforms for simplified virtual learning and cohort-based programs.
